name: KDAlt
subtitle: a powerful app library made with love & designed with the user in mind!
description: KDAlt is a sub-branch of a much bigger project code-named KDRepo which is designed to be a one way solution for all your sideloading needs! it will remove the pain of searching the internet to find a clean and professional repo for your sideloader.

apps.name: snapchat iota
apps.subtitle: #1 snapchat tweak out there!
apps.localizedDescription: snapchat iota is arguably the best tweak for snapchat to date. with a ton of great features and the great devs that are putting hard work behind the scenes to get everything up and running all the time, snapchat iota is definetly a great investment for your app library.

versions.localizedDescription:
[ Status: ⚠️ ] - You can use the tweak all its features are working, but as of currently, using this version will get your snapchat account locked whenever Snap Inc. decides to launch a ban wave.
As soon as you log in to the account using the tweak your account will be flagged. Please use an alt. account or similar before launching this tweak!

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This will allow Snapchat to connect to bluetooth accessories like Spectacles.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Snapchat needs to know about devices connected to your phone to tailor your experience across them.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Use your camera to take Snaps, play with Lenses, and more! Some Lenses may use Apples TrueDepth camera.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be uploaded to Snapchat's servers so you and others can find friends, and to improve your experience.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This will allow Snapchat to connect to Wi-Fi enabled accessories like Spectacles.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Choosing 'Always Allow' will let Snapchat update your location in the background to share Live Location and to improve your experience.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Choosing 'Always Allow' will let Snapchat update your location in the background to share Live Location and to improve your experience.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Snapchat uses this to customize your experience and let you discover filters, stories, and more around you.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Use your microphone to record audio for Snaps, video chat, and more.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: Snapchat records if your device was vertical or horizontal when you take Snaps, use Lenses, read Discover, and watch ads.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Grant photo library access to share camera roll content with friends and personalize your experience on Snapchat.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Save Snaps you take to your Camera Roll, send photos and videos in Chat, and more.
privacy.NSUserActivityTypes: INSendMessageIntent - Siri creates an INSendMessageIntent object when the user asks to send a message to one or more users. This intent object contains the message to send and the recipients of the message
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: By selecting 'Allow,' Snap may reduce the ads you find irrelevant or repetitive over time.
